community.no-results: No users found with that user name or email address.

configure.enable-pre-moderation-text: Moderators must approve any comment before it is published.
configure.require-email-verification-text: New Users must verify their email before commenting
configure.include-comment-stream: Include Comment Stream Description for Readers.
configure.include-comment-stream-desc: Write a message to be added to the top of your comment stream. Pose a topic, include community guidelines, etc.
configure.banned-word-text: Comments which contain these words or phrases (not case-sensitive) will be automatically removed from the comment stream. Type a word and press Enter or Tab to add. Optionally paste a comma-separated list.
configure.suspect-word-text: Comments which contain these words or phrases (not case-sensitive) will be highlighted in the comment stream. Type a word and press Enter or Tab to add. Optionally paste a comma-separated list.
configure.copy-and-paste: Copy and paste code below into your CMS to embed your comment box in your articles
configure.closed-comments-desc: Write a message for closed threads
configure.domain-list-text: Some instructions on how to type the urls.

bandialog.are_you_sure: Are you sure you would like to ban {0}?
bandialog.note: Note: Banning this user will also place this comment in the Rejected queue.

suspenduser.description_0: Would you like to temporarily ban this user becuase of their {0}? Doing so will temporarily hide their comments until they rewrite their {0}.
suspenduser.title_1: Notify the user of their temporary suspension
suspenduser.description_1: Suspending this user will temporarily disable their account and hide all of their comments on the site.
suspenduser.email: Another member of the community recently flagged your {0} for review. Because of its content your {0} was rejected. This means you can no longer comment, like, or flag content until you rewrite your {0}. Please e-mail moderator@newsorg.com if you have any questions or concerns.

community.account_creation_date: Fecha de creación de la cuenta
community.no-results: No se encontraron usuarios con ese nombre de usuario o correo electronico.

configure.enable-pre-moderation-text: Los moderadores deben aprobar cada comentario antes de que sea publicado.
configure.require-email-verification-text: Nuevos usuarios deben verificar sus correos antes de comentar
configure.include-comment-stream: Incluir la Descripción a un Hilo de Comentario para los y las Lectoras.
configure.include-comment-stream-desc: Escribir un mensaje que será agregado a la parte de arriba del tu hilo de comentarios. Por ejemplo, un tema, guias de comunidad, etc.
configure.banned-word-text: Comentarios que contengan estas palabras o frases, no separadas por comas y en mayusculas o minusuculas, serán automaticamente separadas de los comentarios publicados.
configure.suspect-word-text: Comments which contain these words or phrases (not case-sensitive) will be highlighted in the comment stream. Type a word and press Enter or Tab to add. Optionally paste a comma-separated list.
configure.copy-and-paste: Copiar y pegar el código de más abajo en tu CMS para colocar la caja de comentarios en tus articulos
configure.closed-comments-desc: Escribe un mensaje para cuando los comentarios se encuentran cerrados
configure.comment-count-error: Por favor escribe un número válido.
configure.domain-list-text: Instrucciones de como ingresar las URLs.

bandialog.are_you_sure: Estas segura que quieres suspender a {props.author.displayName}?
bandialog.note: Nota: Suspender este usuario también va a colocar este comentario en la cola de Rechazados.
